snippet: The Global Commission on Drug Policy, a group made up of former presidents and politicians, is calling for less emphasis on punishment and more on treatment while still targeting criminal drug gang operations.
abstract: Global Commission on Drug Policy, coalition of world political figures, is urging governments to decriminalize variety of illegal drugs and set up regulated drug markets within their own countries.
lead_paragraph: The Global Commission on Drug Policy, a group made up of former presidents and politicians, is calling for less emphasis on punishment and more on treatment while still targeting criminal drug gang operations.

headline.main: Coalition Urges Nations to Decriminalize Drugs and Drug Use
headline.print_headline: Coalition Urges Nations to Decriminalize Drugs and Drug Use
